snippet.title: Entity Room Trailer
snippet.description:
Entity Room is a short indie horror game, in which you're working in an underground lab. Your job is to make sure the entity is being fed every day and the rooms are cleaned afterwards.

ItchIO: https://gemezl.itch.io/entity-room
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MrGemezl
